name: Mendel's Garden
description:
What is Mendel's Garden?

Mendel's garden is a gardening game where every plant has one or more traits, many of which are hidden. You harvest seeds from these plants and try to isolate these hidden traits by planting and growing the seeds. Craft items by combining seeds with different traits and use these items to progress further in the world.

The gardens

The world contains multiple gardens with their own strange plants and mutations.
  • 1. Grow plants instantly using a special kind of rain.
  • 2. Overcome barriers by crafting the appropriate plants or items and explore the deepest parts of the gardens
  • 3. Guard against rot, and other ill effects and ensure your plants are healthy and yield useful items
  • 4. Explore many different gardens each with their own unique twist to gameplay and containing many plants to grow, items to craft and narratives to explore.

Story

Set in the Bhumi universe Mendel's garden explores the story of Mendel and his journey alongside his ever loyal and super-cute friend Miky as well as others. Mendel ventures into unknown lands teeming with helpful and harmful plants to learn about them and understand them. In doing so he stumbles upon ancient secrets, dark mysteries and most importantly finds his purpose in this strange world.
